name: Hay Bale
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="hayBaleGrad" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(240,200,80);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(180,140,40);stop-opacity:1" />
    </linearGradient>
    <radialGradient id="hayBaleShine" cx="30%" cy="30%" r="70%" fx="30%" fy="30%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgba(255,255,255,0.7);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgba(255,255,255,0);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
  </defs>
  <rect x="100" y="200" width="312" height="200" rx="30" ry="30" fill="url(#hayBaleGrad)" stroke="#907020" stroke-width="5" />
  <rect x="110" y="210" width="292" height="180" rx="25" ry="25" fill="url(#hayBaleShine)" opacity="0.4" />
  <path d="M 100 250 C 150 220, 362 220, 412 250" stroke="#806010" stroke-width="10" stroke-linecap="round" />
  <path d="M 100 300 C 150 270, 362 270, 412 300" stroke="#806010" stroke-width="10" stroke-linecap="round" />
  <path d="M 100 350 C 150 320, 362 320, 412 350" stroke="#806010" stroke-width="10" stroke-linecap="round" />
</svg>

name: Wooden Fence
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="fenceWoodGrad" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(160,82,45);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(100,41,10);stop-opacity:1" />
    </linearGradient>
    <radialGradient id="fenceShine" cx="30%" cy="30%" r="70%" fx="30%" fy="30%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgba(255,255,255,0.4);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgba(255,255,255,0);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
  </defs>
  <rect x="100" y="350" width="312" height="50" rx="10" ry="10" fill="url(#fenceWoodGrad)" stroke="#6B2D18" stroke-width="5" />
  <rect x="100" y="280" width="312" height="50" rx="10" ry="10" fill="url(#fenceWoodGrad)" stroke="#6B2D18" stroke-width="5" />
  <path d="M 100 350 L 100 400 L 150 400 L 150 350 Z" fill="url(#fenceShine)" opacity="0.6" />
  <rect x="90" y="250" width="20" height="200" fill="url(#fenceWoodGrad)" rx="5" ry="5" stroke="#6B2D18" stroke-width="5" />
  <rect x="390" y="250" width="20" height="200" fill="url(#fenceWoodGrad)" rx="5" ry="5" stroke="#6B2D18" stroke-width="5" />
</svg>

name: Red Barn
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="barnRedGrad" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(220,50,50);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(170,0,0);stop-opacity:1" />
    </linearGradient>
    <radialGradient id="barnRoofShine" cx="50%" cy="30%" r="70%" fx="50%" fy="30%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgba(255,255,255,0.3);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgba(255,255,255,0);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
  </defs>
  <rect x="100" y="200" width="312" height="250" fill="url(#barnRedGrad)" stroke="#8B0000" stroke-width="5" />
  <polygon points="100,200 412,200 256,50" fill="url(#barnRedGrad)" stroke="#8B0000" stroke-width="5" />
  <path d="M 100 200 L 412 200 L 256 50 Z" fill="url(#barnRoofShine)" opacity="0.6" />
  <rect x="200" y="300" width="112" height="150" fill="#663300" />
  <path d="M 256 320 L 256 450" stroke="#FFD700" stroke-width="3" />
</svg>

name: Farm Tractor
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="tractorBodyGrad" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(255,100,100);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(200,50,50);stop-opacity:1" />
    </linearGradient>
    <radialGradient id="tractorTireGrad" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="50%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(50,50,50);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(10,10,10);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
  </defs>
  <rect x="150" y="250" width="212" height="100" fill="url(#tractorBodyGrad)" rx="10" ry="10" stroke="#9C2C2C" stroke-width="5" />
  <rect x="150" y="200" width="80" height="50" fill="url(#tractorBodyGrad)" stroke="#9C2C2C" stroke-width="5" />
  <circle cx="350" cy="350" r="50" fill="url(#tractorTireGrad)" />
  <circle cx="180" cy="350" r="30" fill="url(#tractorTireGrad)" />
  <rect x="230" y="150" width="12" height="50" fill="#666666" />
</svg>

name: Chicken Coop
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="coopWoodGrad" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(180,120,70);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(120,70,30);stop-opacity:1" />
    </linearGradient>
    <linearGradient id="coopRoofGrad" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(150,150,150);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(100,100,100);stop-opacity:1" />
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  <rect x="150" y="300" width="212" height="150" fill="url(#coopWoodGrad)" stroke="#8B4513" stroke-width="5" />
  <polygon points="150,300 362,300 256,200" fill="url(#coopRoofGrad)" stroke="#8B4513" stroke-width="5" />
  <path d="M 200 450 L 312 450 L 312 350 L 200 350 Z" fill="#663300" />
  <path d="M 250 350 L 250 450" stroke="#8B4513" stroke-width="3" />
</svg>

name: Corn Stalk
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="cornStalkGrad" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(150,200,100);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(100,150,50);stop-opacity:1" />
    </linearGradient>
    <radialGradient id="cornCobGrad" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="50%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(255,255,100);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(200,200,50);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
  </defs>
  <rect x="240" y="150" width="32" height="300" fill="url(#cornStalkGrad)" rx="5" ry="5" />
  <ellipse cx="256" cy="250" rx="20" ry="50" fill="url(#cornCobGrad)" />
  <path d="M 272 250 L 350 200 L 300 250 Z" fill="url(#cornStalkGrad)" />
</svg>

name: Garden Shovel
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="shovelHandleGrad" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(180,120,70);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(120,70,30);stop-opacity:1" />
    </linearGradient>
    <radialGradient id="shovelHeadGrad" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="50%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(150,150,150);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(100,100,100);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
  </defs>
  <rect x="246" y="100" width="20" height="300" fill="url(#shovelHandleGrad)" rx="5" ry="5" />
  <path d="M 226 400 L 286 400 L 256 450 Z" fill="url(#shovelHeadGrad)" />
  <circle cx="256" cy="100" r="15" fill="url(#shovelHandleGrad)" />
</svg>

name: Apple Picking Basket
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="basketGrad" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(180,120,70);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(120,70,30);stop-opacity:1" />
    </linearGradient>
    <radialGradient id="appleGrad" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="50%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(255,100,100);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(200,50,50);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
  </defs>
  <path d="M 150 400 L 362 400 L 380 250 L 132 250 Z" fill="url(#basketGrad)" stroke="#8B4513" stroke-width="5" />
  <path d="M 150 250 A 100 20 0 1 0 362 250" stroke="url(#basketGrad)" stroke-width="10" fill="none" />
  <circle cx="256" cy="230" r="20" fill="url(#appleGrad)" />
  <circle cx="200" cy="240" r="20" fill="url(#appleGrad)" />
  <circle cx="312" cy="240" r="20" fill="url(#appleGrad)" />
</svg>

name: Pitchfork
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="forkHandleGrad" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(180,120,70);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(120,70,30);stop-opacity:1" />
    </linearGradient>
    <radialGradient id="forkHeadGrad" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="50%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(150,150,150);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(100,100,100);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
  </defs>
  <rect x="246" y="100" width="20" height="300" fill="url(#forkHandleGrad)" rx="5" ry="5" />
  <rect x="236" y="400" width="10" height="50" fill="url(#forkHeadGrad)" />
  <rect x="266" y="400" width="10" height="50" fill="url(#forkHeadGrad)" />
  <rect x="251" y="400" width="10" height="50" fill="url(#forkHeadGrad)" />
</svg>

name: Watering Can
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="canMetalGrad" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(150,200,150);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(100,150,100);stop-opacity:1" />
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  <path d="M 150 400 L 362 400 L 380 300 L 132 300 Z" fill="url(#canMetalGrad)" stroke="#50A050" stroke-width="5" />
  <path d="M 250 300 Q 350 200, 400 250" stroke="url(#canMetalGrad)" stroke-width="20" fill="none" />
  <path d="M 180 300 Q 150 250, 200 200" stroke="url(#canMetalGrad)" stroke-width="15" fill="none" />
</svg>
